 SYSTEM IS EXPOSED WHEN SUBMITTING FEEDBACK!

 Repository Mirroring Tool (RMT) is an open-source project and we can make it
 even better with your help and feedback.

 When adding your feedback/bug please keep in mind:
   - This is not a support channel. If you are having paid support from SUSE
     business please go to https://scc.suse.com/support for support.
   - When posting bugs/feedback here, there is no guarantee that the issue
     will be handled immediately. Depending on the topic and the availability
     of the developers, the issue maybe resolved in undefined time.
   - Make sure that you don't expose any personal or private information.
